mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid as articleUuid, a.article_img, a.title, a.content, a.create_by, a.update_time, a.read_num, b.uuid AS user_uuid, b.user_name, c.uuid AS voc_uuid, c.voc_code, c.`name` as voc_name FROM article a INNER JOIN `user` b ON a.create_by = b.uuid LEFT JOIN voc c ON c.uuid = a.voc_type WHERE a.uuid = #{uuid} LIMIT 1
